title: Creamy corn chowder
ingredients: ['1 tbsp vegetable oil', '3 rindless, smoked streaky bacon rashers, chopped', '1 large onion, chopped', '450g waxy potatoes, peeled and quartered', '625ml chicken stock', '6 large corn cobs, shucked', '625ml semi-skimmed milk', '1/4 tsp hot pepper sauce, or to taste', 'pinch of salt', 'chopped fresh parsley to garnish']
